hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); if echo "$INPUT" | grep -q "git commit"; then echo "[DocAlign] Code committed. Consider running get_doc_health or check_doc to verify documentation is still accurate."; fi'
bash -c 'test -f .docalign/config.yml || echo "[DocAlign] Setup required: run /docalign-setup to configure documentation monitoring for this project."'
